channel.title: Debian stable issue #1: change sound model from ich6 to ac97?
channel.description:
Still having this issue: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/KVM#hda-duplex_not_supported_in_this_QEMU_binary My version numbers are the same as https://www.whonix.org/wiki/KVM#Debian_stable (click expand and scroll down to check version numbers). Changing [code]
[/code] to [code]
[/code] solves it. But there are 2 more debian stable related issues, that I will post in separate threads. So maybe we don't have to make this change, but can fix the root of this issue.

item.title: Debian stable issue #1: change sound model from ich6 to ac97?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Still having this issue:

Whonix – 4 May 20

Whonix ™ for KVM

Using Whonix ™ with KVM (Kernel Virtual Machine)

My version numbers are the same as https://www.whonix.org/wiki/KVM#Debian_stable (click expand and scroll down to check version numbers).

Changing

<pre>
    <sound model='ich6'>
</pre>

to

<pre>
    <sound model='ac97'>
</pre>

solves it.

But there are 2 more debian stable related issues, that I will post in separate threads. So maybe we don’t have to make this change, but can fix the root of this issue.

Read full topic
item.source: Debian stable issue #1: change sound model from ich6 to ac97?
